name: ZamuZamu
description:
Use Left/Right arrow keys or A/D for movement, and Left Click to swing your sword.

This is a short game about a samurai, on a journey to kill some evil birds. Honestly it's not much of a game. Mostly made for testing some animations I made. And I'm mostly uploading it just to have it online somewhere.

Content stolen from:

Dark Funeral. Joe Hisaishi, Hokusai, Hiroshige, Kurosawa's Ran, Wang Ximeng, Franz Lanting, and probably others that I forgot. 

Tools used: Unity, Krita.
